content: Can he make it to the finals in Wilmbledon?

comments.body: There is an ongoing sportsbetting discussion thread related to Tennis League. You can talk and have a discussion with sportbetting people there about Kyrgios. I think they currently discussing the match happening at Wimbledon 2022.- https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1200104.0P.S. You can lock the thread once you have found it.
